pandas_utils

pandas_utils

Define utilities to work with DataFrames.

Functions

Name Description
highlight_conditionally Highlight rows based on conditional match(es) in column.
highlight_multiple_columns Hilight multiple columns.
highlight_multiple_columns_row_greater_than .
highlight_multiple_columns_ver2 .
highlight_unequal_columns Hilight rows based on column inequality condition.
show_df Show DataFrame with a summary in multi-row header.
show_nans_dtypes_nunique Summarize missing values, datatypes and number of unique values in header.

Highlight rows based on conditional match(es) in column.

show_df

pandas_utils.show_df(df)

Show DataFrame with a summary in multi-row header.

Parameters

Name Type Description Default
df pandas.pandas.DataFrame dataframe to be shown required

show_nans_dtypes_nunique

pandas_utils.show_nans_dtypes_nunique(df, show_transpose=False)

Summarize missing values, datatypes and number of unique values in header.

Parameters

Name Type Description Default
df pandas.pandas.DataFrame dataframe to be summarized required
show_transpose bool whether to show a transpose of the summarized DataFrame False
